title: Edit task is slow and error-prone
problem: T2 has the highest median time and the only non-100% completion; one JS-on attempt triggered a validation error when clearing the title.
proposed_fix: Improve T2 edit flow: make Save more obvious, ensure validation error is clearly visible and easy to recover from, and consider focus/feedback tweaks.

title: No-JS delete feedback feels weak
problem: No-JS participant hesitated and asked if the task was really deleted; feedback is technically correct but not very reassuring.
proposed_fix: Strengthen no-JS confirmation message after delete (e.g. clearer status text on the list page).

title: Keyboard users need many Tabs to reach Delete
problem: Keyboard-first participant needed several Tab presses to reach the Delete button at the end of each row; this increases effort but did not cause failures in pilots.
proposed_fix: If time allows, adjust row layout or add skip-to-actions pattern so keyboard users can reach row actions faster.
